subject: Indian History
topic: Bhartiya Itihas ki Mahatvapurna Ghatnaye (Ancient & Medieval)
question_en: Who was the founder of the Mauryan Empire?
question_hi: मौर्य साम्राज्य के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Chandragupta Maurya was the founder of the Mauryan Empire.
explanation_hi: चंद्रगुप्त मौर्य मौर्य साम्राज्य के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bhartiya Itihas ki Mahatvapurna Ghatnaye (Ancient & Medieval)
question_en: Which battle marked the end of the Maratha Empire?
question_hi: कौन सी लड़ाई ने मराठा साम्राज्य का अंत किया?
explanation_en: The Third Battle of Panipat marked the end of the Maratha Empire.
explanation_hi: तीसरी पानीपत की लड़ाई ने मराठा साम्राज्य का अंत किया।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bhartiya Itihas ki Mahatvapurna Ghatnaye (Ancient & Medieval)
question_en: Who was the famous female ruler of Jhansi?
question_hi: झांसी की प्रसिद्ध महिला शासक कौन थीं?
explanation_en: Rani Lakshmibai was the famous female ruler of Jhansi.
explanation_hi: रानी लक्ष्मीबाई झांसी की प्रसिद्ध महिला शासक थीं।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bhartiya Itihas ki Mahatvapurna Ghatnaye (Ancient & Medieval)
question_en: The Red Fort was built by which Mughal Emperor?
question_hi: लाल किला किस मुगल बादशाह द्वारा बनवाया गया था?
explanation_en: The Red Fort was built by Shah Jahan.
explanation_hi: लाल किला शाहजहाँ द्वारा बनवाया गया था।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bhartiya Itihas ki Mahatvapurna Ghatnaye (Ancient & Medieval)
question_en: The Battle of Plassey was fought in which year?
question_hi: प्लासी की लड़ाई किस वर्ष में लड़ी गई थी?
explanation_en: The Battle of Plassey was fought in 1757.
explanation_hi: प्लासी की लड़ाई 1757 में लड़ी गई थी।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bhartiya Itihas ki Mahatvapurna Ghatnaye (Ancient & Medieval)
question_en: Vikramaditya was a famous ruler of which dynasty?
question_hi: विक्रमादित्य किस वंश के एक प्रसिद्ध शासक थे?
explanation_en: Vikramaditya was a famous ruler of the Gupta dynasty.
explanation_hi: विक्रमादित्य गुप्त वंश के एक प्रसिद्ध शासक थे।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bhartiya Itihas ki Mahatvapurna Ghatnaye (Ancient & Medieval)
question_en: The ancient Indian text 'Manusmriti' was written by which sage?
question_hi: प्राचीन भारतीय ग्रंथ 'मनुस्मृति' की रचना किस ऋषि ने की थी?
explanation_en: The ancient Indian text 'Manusmriti' was written by Manu.
explanation_hi: प्राचीन भारतीय ग्रंथ 'मनुस्मृति' की रचना मनु ने की थी।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bhartiya Itihas ki Mahatvapurna Ghatnaye (Ancient & Medieval)
question_en: The Sikh Rebellion was led by which famous Sikh leader?
question_hi: सिख विद्रोह का नेतृत्व किस प्रसिद्ध सिख नेता ने किया था?
explanation_en: The Sikh Rebellion was led by Banda Singh Bahadur.
explanation_hi: सिख विद्रोह का नेतृत्व बंदा सिंह बहादुर ने किया था।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bhartiya Itihas ki Mahatvapurna Ghatnaye (Ancient & Medieval)
question_en: The Pallava dynasty was famous for building which temples?
explanation_en: The Pallava dynasty was famous for building temples at Mahabalipuram.
explanation_hi: पल्लव वंश महाबलीपुरम में मंदिरों के निर्माण के लिए प्रसिद्ध था।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bhartiya Itihas ki Mahatvapurna Ghatnaye (Ancient & Medieval)
question_en: The Delhi Sultanate was established by which ruler?
question_hi: दिल्ली सल्तनत की स्थापना किस शासक ने की थी?
explanation_en: The Delhi Sultanate was established by Qutb-ud-din Aibak.
explanation_hi: दिल्ली सल्तनत की स्थापना कुतुब-उद-दीन ऐबक ने की थी।
